LamBox.Empty:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Empty
      constructors:

Input.Bool:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Bool
      constructors:
        r#false (0 arg(s))
        r#true (0 arg(s))

Input.and:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ _ →
            case<Input.Bool{0},0> @1 of
              λ<[]> Input.Bool{0}{0}
              λ<[]> @0

Input.not:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ →
            case<Input.Bool{0},0> @0 of
              λ<[]> Input.Bool{0}{1}
              λ<[]> Input.Bool{0}{0}

Input.Export:
  mutual inductive(s):
    Export
      constructors: constructor (2 arg(s))

Input.main:
  constant declaration:
    body: Input.Export{0}{0} (Input.and) (Input.not)

Input.Export.nt:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ → case<Input.Export{0},0> @0 of λ<[_, _]> @0

Input.Export.ad:
  constant declaration:
    body: λ _ → case<Input.Export{0},0> @0 of λ<[_, _]> @1
main program: [Input.main]
